Jeong Deunhaesol

Introduction

Jeong Deunhaesol is a South Korean trainee.

He is a former member of the pre-debut boy group ALLART BOYZ under ALLART Entertainment, which he is believed to have left in October 2023.

On February 20, 2023, he was announced as a contestant on MBC's survival show Fantasy Boys. He was eliminated in episode 7 after ranking 33rd place.

He was revealed as a member of NineTwo Entertainment's upcoming boy group 3WAY on December 3, 2023. The agency announced his departure on March 4, 2024.

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7 starting in October 2024. He was eliminated from the show in episode 8 after ranking 68th place.
